rdf:Description.dc:title: Beyond prairie potholes : a draft policy for managing Alberta's peatlands and non-settled area wetlands : for discussion purposes 1993 a draft policy for managing Alberta's peatlands and non-settled area wetlands : for discussion purposes.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta Water Resources Commission.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Draft policy document providing background information about wetlands, their functions, and value to Albertans. Goals for wetland management, as well as strategies to achieve them are also presented.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Peatlands
Peatlands
Wetlands
